rules_text:
[i](As this enters, insert it into one of your programs.)[/i]
When this Subroutine enters, you may discard a card. When you do, it deals damage equal to that card’s mana value to target creature or planeswalker.
Whenever this Subroutine runs, create a 4/4 red Error creature token with menace.
notes:
